document.masterDocTitle: Review of the genus Nysius Dallas from Mongolian Plateau (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Orsillidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Review of the genus Nysius Dallas from Mongolian Plateau (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Orsillidae)

subSubSection.paragraph: Measurements. Male. (n=10): Total length: 3.60–4.40 (4.01); head length: 0.73–0.81 (0.77); head width: 0.97–1.10 (1.01); interocular space: 0.60–0.65 (0.62); Antennal segments:? 0.30–0.34 (0.32);? 0.65–0.68 (0.67);? 0.53–0.55 (0.54);? 0.62–0.68 (0.66); pronotum length: 0.75–0.84 (0.80); pronotum width: 1.20–1.30 (1.22); scutellum length: 0.62–0.64 (0.63); scutellum width: 0.79–0.81 (0.80); claval commissure length: 0.54–0.56 (0.55); abdomen length: 2.00–2.50 (2.29); abdominal width: 0.78–1.20 (1.04).

Distribution. Inner Mongolia , China : Baotou City (Daerhanmaominganlianheqi), Hohhot City ( Mt. Daqing, Helingeer county, Qingshuihe county, Tumotezuoqi), Wulanchabu City (Liangcheng County, Zhuozi County ), Xilingol League ( Zhengxiangbaiqi, Dongwuzhumuqinqi, Zhenglanqi, Taipusiqi, Xiwuzhumuqinqi, Xilinhot city ), Chifeng City ( Alukerqinqi, Keshiketengqi, kalaqinqi, Balinzuoqi, Balinyouqi ), Tongliao City (Keerqinzuoyihouqi, Naimanqi, Huolinguole City, Zhaluteqi, Keerqinzuoyizhongqi ), Hinggan League (Aershan City, Keerqinyouyizhongqi, Keerqinyouyiqianqi, Jalaidqi ), Hulunbuir (Ewenkezizhiqi, Zhalantun City, Chenbaerhuqi, Erguna city, Manzhouli City , Haila'er District, Xinbaerhuzuoqi ); Mongolia : Khuvsgul, Arkhangai , Bulgan , Selenge , Tuv , Khentii , Dornod , Uvurkhangai,
Sukhbaatar
; Elsewhere: China ( Jilin , Liaoning , Hebei , Xizang ), Europe, Asia, North Africa, North America.

Notes . The previous distributional record in Alex League, Ordos City are referred to
Nysius ericae ericae
.
